"Ruslan": "You wouldn't happen to be from Aelio, would you?"
"Garoa really helped me out back in the day."
"...Yeah, he was a great ARKS. Strong, brave, a natural leader. Everyone looked up to him."
"That's why I just couldn't believe the news. There's just no way he..."
"Actually, I did just meet his daughter Aina. If any of you are ever in any trouble, I'd be more than glad to help."
"Garoa once took it on. He completed it too, of course."
"But you know, he said it was even harder than Aelio's Towers."
"What do you think? Think you can take it on yourself?"
"It's essential that you never overwork yourself."
"...is what Garoa once said. Made it sound like my own words though, ahaha..."
"Oh, I see. If you do decide to take it on, just give me a holler again."
"I need to work hard, too. So I can be the kind of ARKS Garoa was some day..."
"Thanks for everything. You've been a great inspiration."
